original_text:
He has shown his people the power of his works,
    in giving them the inheritance of the nations.
korean_text: 그가 그들에게 뭇 나라의 기업을 주사 그가 행하시는 일의 능력을 그들에게 알리셨도다

sentences.original_text: He has shown his people the power of his works
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 자기 백성에게 그 행위의 능력을 보여주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: in giving them the inheritance of the nations.
